CatDescriptText: Cutline of related images published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 20, 1953, page 22 and 23, reads: "Plenty of Booths, Prizes and Crowds at Courier's Pittsburgh Home Service Fair"
TitMainTitle: Man dancing on stage with display of Crosley Appliances and sign for Gem razors, audience in foreground, in Ammon Center for 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
